markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Acrobat's Staff](/Equipment.aspx?ID=581)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 235 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Bo Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 striking [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)_ is particularly long, making it useful as a balancing pole. While you wield it, the acrobat’s staff releases chalk dust to make your grip more secure, granting you a +1 circumstance bonus to your Reflex DC against checks to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) you of it.

<document level="2" id="action-362" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Acrobat's Staff
